alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:15PM CDT until June 17 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL HUTCHINSON...CENTRAL ROBERTS AND WEST CENTRAL HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 615 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Codman, or 14 miles northwest of Miami, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Hutchinson, central Roberts and west central Hemphill Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
